oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Halliburton Tower
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "The Richard Halliburton Memorial Tower, on the campus of Southwestern at Memphis, a co-educational college of liberal arts and sciences. The beautiful collegiate Gothic shaft rises 140 feet above the campus. Built by Wesley Halliburton, in honor of his son, the late Richard Halliburton, world traveler and author."
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Southwestern at Memphis; Halliburton, Richard; Rhodes College;
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Gift of Michael Crawford; Digitized by S. Frierson
